definition: required by rule, a territory surrendered by Turkey or Germany after World War I and put under the tutelage of some other European power until they are able to stand by themselves
details:
adjective
- required by rule
= synonyms: compulsory
noun
- a territory surrendered by Turkey or Germany after World War I and put under the tutelage of some other European power until they are able to stand by themselves
= synonyms: mandate
- the recipient of a mandate
= synonyms: mandatary
